properties.Land_Slide: 1. Flooding Over flow - Pitadeniya canal -Near the Mr. Devid's home
properties.Proposed_M: Construction of 30 m long 1.2 m x 1.2 m (width x height) Rectangular concrete canal wall thickness 125 mm. It is also needed to mark reserved lands along the canal and plant trees such as areca-nut trees.

properties.Land_Slide: 2. Flooding Over flow - Pitadeniya canal - Near the Mr. H A Pushpakumara's house
properties.Proposed_M: Construction of 20 m long 0.6 m x 0.75 m (width x height) Rectangular concrete canal wall thickness 125 mm. It is also necessary to mark reserved lands along the canal and plant trees such as areca-nut trees.
